BYTE RFStatusValid
 0 means next 18 structure members DO NOT contain valid data (ChannelNumber, DeModStats, VSBMode, SER_1, SER_10, SNR_BE, SNR_AE, Carrier_Off, IF_AGC, RFAGC, FEC_UnErr, FEC_Corr, FEC_UnCorr, FieldLocked, EqualizerState, ChannelState, NTSC_Filter, InverseSpectrum)
WORD ChannelNumber
 Channel number the device is tuned to.
BYTE DeModStats
 Demodulator status, bit 0 (Lock), bit 1 (channel equalizer on/off), bits 2-3 (channel state 0 = dynamic, 1 = static, 2 = fast dynamic), bit 4 (NTSC filter on/off), bit 7 (spectrum inverted/not inverted). Repeated in structure members FieldLocked, EqualizerState, ChannelState, NTSC_Filter and InverseSpectrum).
BYTE VSBMode
 modulation order, always 8 VSB with an A75

float IF_AGC
 AGC of IF amp.
float RFAGC
 AGC of RF amp.
WORD FEC_UnErr
 FEC Unerrorred (number of frames that had errors removed but not guaranteed correct).
WORD FEC_Corr
 FEC Corrected (number of frames corrected).
WORD FEC_UnCorr
 FEC Uncorrected (number of frames that couldn't be corrected).
bool FieldLocked
 Field locked (true or false).
bool EqualizerState
 Equalizer state (True = on, False = off).
BYTE ChannelState
 0:Dynamic, 1:Static, 2:Fast Dynamic
bool NTSC_Filter
 True: ON, False: OFF.
bool InverseSpectrum
 True: Spectrum inverted, False: Not inverted.

 Reserved fields. Undocumented/unsupported.

Detailed Description

The status structure for an A75 device.

Pass a pointer to one of these to getStatus() to have it filled in for you.

Member Data Documentation

BYTE A75_Status::FirmWareVer

DSP Firmware version.

BYTE A75_Status::FirmWareRev

DSP Firmware revision.

WORD A75_Status::RF_FIRMWARE

RF Firmware version and revision.

BYTE A75_Status::IGMP_Enable

0 = forwarding all multicast, 1 = using IGMP

BYTE A75_Status::ReceiverIP[4]

The IP address of the receiver.

BYTE A75_Status::UniCastStatusDestIP[4]

The destination IP address for unicast status messages.

BYTE A75_Status::SubnetMask[4]

Subnet mask of the device.

BYTE A75_Status::DefaultGatewayIP[4]

The default gateway IP address to route traffic to.

WORD A75_Status::UniCastStatusDestUDP

Destination UDP port for unicast status messages.

BYTE A75_Status::ReceiverMAC[6]

The MAC address of the receiver (Ethernet MAC).

BYTE A75_Status::RFStatusValid

0 means next 18 structure members DO NOT contain valid data (ChannelNumber, DeModStats, VSBMode, SER_1, SER_10, SNR_BE, SNR_AE, Carrier_Off, IF_AGC, RFAGC, FEC_UnErr, FEC_Corr, FEC_UnCorr, FieldLocked, EqualizerState, ChannelState, NTSC_Filter, InverseSpectrum)

WORD A75_Status::ChannelNumber

Channel number the device is tuned to.

BYTE A75_Status::DeModStats

Demodulator status, bit 0 (Lock), bit 1 (channel equalizer on/off), bits 2-3 (channel state 0 = dynamic, 1 = static, 2 = fast dynamic), bit 4 (NTSC filter on/off), bit 7 (spectrum inverted/not inverted). Repeated in structure members FieldLocked, EqualizerState, ChannelState, NTSC_Filter and InverseSpectrum).

BYTE A75_Status::VSBMode

modulation order, always 8 VSB with an A75

BYTE A75_Status::SER_1

1 second symbol error rate

BYTE A75_Status::SER_10

10 second symbol error rate

float A75_Status::SNR_BE

SNR before equalization.

float A75_Status::SNR_AE

SNR after equalisation.

float A75_Status::Carrier_Off

Carrier offset in Hz.

float A75_Status::IF_AGC

AGC of IF amp.

float A75_Status::RFAGC

AGC of RF amp.

WORD A75_Status::FEC_UnErr

FEC Unerrorred (number of frames that had errors removed but not guaranteed correct).

WORD A75_Status::FEC_Corr

FEC Corrected (number of frames corrected).

WORD A75_Status::FEC_UnCorr

FEC Uncorrected (number of frames that couldn't be corrected).

bool A75_Status::FieldLocked

Field locked (true or false).

bool A75_Status::EqualizerState

Equalizer state (True = on, False = off).

BYTE A75_Status::ChannelState

0:Dynamic, 1:Static, 2:Fast Dynamic

bool A75_Status::NTSC_Filter

True: ON, False: OFF.

bool A75_Status::InverseSpectrum

True: Spectrum inverted, False: Not inverted.

The PID List.
